attributes.action: Vote against a 2nd Referendum. Be happy with the democratic decision.
attributes.additional_details: People who didn't get their own way in the 2016 referendum have petitioned to hold a 2nd referendum simply because they didn't get their own way 1st time around.
attributes.background: We the people of the U.K. have a voting right, we used it and a choice to leave the EU was made. A 2nd referendum shouldn't be held because some people of the U.K. didn't get their own way.
